pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, May 20, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Sept-Îles, Quebec

Private meetings

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Aluminerie Alouette to highlight investments in Canada’s critical minerals sector. A brief media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chiefs of the Innu Nation.

Closed to media

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with mineral technology students at the Cégep de Sept-Îles.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
